ca.ualberta.backend
Class Task

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.backend.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Task is the data class for Tasks. handles storage and easy transferring of tasks between methods

Author:
kerr2
See Also:

          setResult attaches the description and resulting photo file to the task

          setTimestamp will be used to set the timestamp value if the task is old (for sorting purposes)
